name: Space Colony
notes:
If you want to play/install the game you need to manually mount your CD/DVD in your system.
After the CD/DVD is mounted you can launch the game this may take a few minutes.
Beforehand the game tries to validate your disc.

You can download an HD Patch for the game here: http://www.spacecolonyhd.com/patch.html
content:
arch: win32
exe: prefix/drive_c/Program Files/Firefly Studios/Space Colony/Space Colony.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Windows Version to XP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: directmusic
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Direct Music
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: directplay
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Direct Play
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9_36
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- insert-disc:
    requires: autoplay.exe
- task:
    executable: $DISC/autoplay.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Windows Version to XP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
